snippet.title: The Sims™ 4 Eco Lifestyle: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover what you can do for the world in The Sims™ 4 Eco Lifestyle Expansion Pack!* Sustainable living starts with reducing, reusing, and recycling, but it goes far beyond that. Learn more here: http://x.ea.com/63231.

Every choice you make affects your community—and their choices affect you too! From the power sources you rely on to how you design your home to the Neighborhood Action Plans you vote for, even the smallest changes can have a huge impact. Will you go green or embrace the swarms of flies?

Available June 5, 2020, on PC/Mac, Xbox One, and PlayStation®4.

Learn more about this Expansion Pack: http://x.ea.com/63231.
Preorder now for PC, Mac, and Xbox One: http://x.ea.com/63235.

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 ON APPLICABLE PLATFORM (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS PACK.
